trans-unit.source: Represents the compiler settings used within the ASP.NET build environment to generate and compile source code from a virtual path.
trans-unit.target: Representa as configurações de compilador usadas no ambiente de build do ASP.NET para gerar e compilar o código-fonte de um caminho virtual.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider.CodeCompilerType%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider> implementation to examine the settings used to generate and compile source code from a virtual path for that build provider.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider.CodeCompilerType%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider> implementação para examinar as configurações usadas para gerar e compilar o código-fonte de um caminho virtual para o provedor de compilação.

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET build environment uses <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider> objects to generate source code for custom file types within the project.
trans-unit.target: O ASP.NET usa do ambiente de compilação <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider> objetos para gerar o código-fonte para os tipos de arquivos personalizados dentro do projeto.

trans-unit.source: Classes derived from <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider> provide build details for source files, Web pages, resources, and other custom items.
trans-unit.target: Classes derivadas de <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider> fornecer detalhes de compilação para arquivos de origem, páginas da Web, recursos e outros itens personalizados.

trans-unit.source: When the build provider requires a specific programming language, it overrides the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider.CodeCompilerType%2A> property and calls the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider.GetDefaultCompilerType%2A> method to return a <xref:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType> object for the supported programming language.
trans-unit.target: Quando o provedor de compilação requer uma linguagem de programação específica, ele substitui o <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider.CodeCompilerType%2A> propriedade e chama o <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider.GetDefaultCompilerType%2A> método para retornar um <xref:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType> objeto para a linguagem de programação com suporte.

trans-unit.source: To set the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType> object within a build provider implementation, use the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider.GetDefaultCompilerType%2A> method or the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider.GetDefaultCompilerTypeForLanguage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para definir o <xref:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType> objeto dentro de uma implementação de provedor de compilação, use o <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider.GetDefaultCompilerType%2A> método ou o <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider.GetDefaultCompilerTypeForLanguage%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType.CodeDomProviderType%2A> property specifies the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementation used to generate and compile source code for a build provider.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType.CodeDomProviderType%2A> propriedade especifica o <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementação usada para gerar e compilar o código-fonte para um provedor de compilação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType.CompilerParameters%2A> property defines the settings used to compile the source code into an assembly.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType.CompilerParameters%2A> propriedade define as configurações usadas para compilar o código-fonte em um assembly.

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates a simple build provider implementation, inheriting from the abstract <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider> base class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir ilustra uma implementação de provedor de compilação simples, herdando abstrata <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider> classe base.

trans-unit.source: The build provider overrides the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider.CodeCompilerType%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider.GetGeneratedType%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider.GenerateCode%2A> members of the base class.
trans-unit.target: O provedor de compilação substitui o <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider.CodeCompilerType%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider.GetGeneratedType%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider.GenerateCode%2A> membros da classe base.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> for the configured <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <see cref="T:System.Type" /> para a implementação de <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> configurada.

trans-unit.source: A read-only <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents the configured code provider type.
trans-unit.target: Somente leitura <see cref="T:System.Type" /> que representa o tipo de provedor de código configurado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType.CodeDomProviderType%2A> property specifies the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementation used to generate and compile source code for a build provider.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType.CodeDomProviderType%2A> propriedade especifica o <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementação usada para gerar e compilar o código-fonte para um provedor de compilação.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the build provider is configured to use the Visual Basic code provider in the .NET Framework, <xref:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType.CodeDomProviderType%2A> returns a <xref:System.Type> for the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.VBCodeProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o provedor de compilação está configurado para usar o provedor de código do Visual Basic no .NET Framework, <xref:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType.CodeDomProviderType%2A> retorna um <xref:System.Type> para o <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.VBCodeProvider> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the settings and options used to compile source code into an assembly.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as configurações e opções usadas para compilar o código-fonte em um assembly.

trans-unit.source: A read-only <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters" /> object that represents the settings and options of the code compiler.
trans-unit.target: Somente leitura <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters" /> objeto que representa as configurações e opções do compilador de código.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType.CompilerParameters%2A> property to examine the compiler options configured for the compiler.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType.CompilerParameters%2A> propriedade para examinar as opções de compilador configuradas para o compilador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType.CompilerParameters%2A> property specifies whether warnings are treated as errors, whether the compiler output includes debug information, and other compiler settings.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType.CompilerParameters%2A> propriedade especifica se os avisos são tratados como erros, se a saída do compilador inclui informações de depuração e outras configurações de compilador.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType" />.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser comparado com a instância de <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object represents the same code provider and compiler settings as the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o objeto especificado representa os mesmos código compilador e provedor de configurações que a instância atual do <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="o" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType" /> object and its value is the same as this instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="o" /> for um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType" /> e seu valor for o mesmo que o dessa instância; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType.Equals%2A> method overrides the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType.Equals%2A> substituições de método de <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType.Equals%2A> compares two instances based on their <xref:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType.CodeDomProviderType%2A>, <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters.WarningLevel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters.CompilerOptions%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters.IncludeDebugInformation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType.Equals%2A> Compara duas instâncias com base em seus <xref:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType.CodeDomProviderType%2A>, <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters.WarningLevel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters.CompilerOptions%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, e <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters.IncludeDebugInformation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o código hash para essa instância.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code for the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType" />, suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures, such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash de inteiro com sinal de 32 bits para a instância atual de <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType" />, adequado para uso em algoritmos de hash e estruturas de dados, tais como uma tabela de hash.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType.GetHashCode%2A> method overrides the <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType.GetHashCode%2A> substituições de método de <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType.GetHashCode%2A> generates the same hash code for two objects that are equal according to the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType.Equals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType.GetHashCode%2A> gera o mesmo código de hash de dois objetos são iguais de acordo com o <xref:System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType.Equals%2A> método.
